name: Alwa's Awakening Gameboy Demake
description:
Requires a Gameboy emulator of flashcart to play!

Alwa's Awakening for the Gameboy is a fan-made demake of the 2017 Elden Pixels game Alwa's Awakening.
You can find the original game on this link.

Known bugs & issues:
  • No music or sfx (only one sfx has been added so far)
  • Slight stutter on leaving save points.
  • No batteryless saving on flashcarts (this causes issues with game loading on emulator)
  • Occasional slow down on screens with multiple projectiles
  • Dismounting ladders can be finicky.
  • Scene transition triggers don't always activate. Try leaving and reentering. Ladder triggers require you to be on the ladder.
  • HUD doesn't always show after dialogue interactions. Should fix itself by entering a new scene. (try pausing and unpausing)
  • Resuming game after pause causes enemies to reset.
  • Some traps and spikes have been disabled due to performance issues
